```{r visualizaiton of GPS metrics over time}
gps_m_df = gps_df_clean
gps_m_df$Date_Number 
subj_m_days = gps_m_df %>% group_by(IID) %>% dplyr::tally(name = "Days")
subj_m_first_date = gps_m_df %>% group_by(IID) %>% slice(1)
subj_m_first_date$Days = subj_m_days$Days

gps_m_df$day_number = unlist(sapply(subj_m_days$Days, function(day) 1:day))
gps_m_df$has_data = 1


plot_subj_m = function(subj_i, metric){
  metric_max = max(gps_m_df[metric],na.rm = T)
  metric_min = min(gps_m_df[metric],na.rm = T)
  gps_m_df_subj = subset(gps_m_df, IID == subj_i)
  metric_num = which(colnames(gps_m_df_subj) == metric)
  metric_col = rainbow_hcl(15)[metric_num-2]
  gps_m_df_subj_metric = data_frame(x = gps_m_df_subj$day_number, y = gps_m_df_subj[,metric_num],Date = gps_m_df_subj$Date)
  #subj_m_plot = ggplot(gps_m_df_subj_metric, aes(x=x, y=y)) + 
  subj_m_plot = ggplot(gps_m_df_subj_metric, aes(x=Date, y=y)) + 
    geom_line(colour=metric_col) + 
    #geom_point(size = 0.5) + 
    #xlim(0,134)+
    #ylim(metric_min,metric_max) +
    #guides(color=guide_legend(title="")) + 
    theme_void() +
    #theme_cowplot() + 
    #xlab(subj_i) + 
    xlab("") +
    #theme(legend.position = "none", axis.ticks.y = element_blank(), axis.title.y = element_blank(), axis.text.y = element_blank(),panel.grid = element_blank(),panel.background = element_blank()) + 
    scale_x_date(date_labels = "%m-%d-%y",limits = c(as.Date("2019-12-15"),as.Date("2020-05-01")), date_breaks = "1 month", date_minor_breaks = "2 week")
    #theme(legend.text=element_text(size=rel(1)))
  return(subj_m_plot)
}

subj_date_order = subj_m_first_date$IID[order(subj_m_first_date$Date,subj_m_first_date$Days)]
subj_m_plots = lapply(subj_date_order, function(subj) plot_subj_m(subj, "has_data"))
subj_m_plots[[43]] =  plot_subj_m(subj_date_order[41], "has_data")
  
pdf(file.path(output_path,paste0("subj_metric_date.pdf")),height = 7,width = 7)
  do.call("grid.arrange", c(subj_m_plots, ncol=1, top = metric))
dev.off()



subj_day_order = subj_m_days$IID[order(subj_m_days$Days)]
metrics = colnames(gps_df)[-c(1,2)]
for (metric in metrics){
  pdf(file.path(output_path,paste0("subj_metric_",metric,".pdf")),height = 4,width = 6)
  subj_m_plots = lapply(subj_day_order, function(subj) plot_subj_m(subj, metric))
  do.call("grid.arrange", c(subj_m_plots, ncol=1, top = metric, bottom = "Time(day)"))
  dev.off()
}

subjs = subj_day_order
for (subj_i in subjs){
  subj_a_plots = lapply(metrics, function(metric) plot_subj_m(subj_i, metric))
  plot_width = 6/134*max(subj_a_plots[[1]]$data$x)
  pdf(file.path(output_path,paste0("subj_all_metrics_",subj_i,".pdf")),height = 4,width = plot_width)
  do.call("grid.arrange", c(subj_a_plots, ncol=1, top = subj_i, bottom = "Time(day)"))
  dev.off()
}

#just_ticks = plot_subj_m(subj, metric)
subj = "7fpv77ag"
subj_a_plots = lapply(metrics, function(metric) plot_subj_m(subj, metric))
subj_a_plots[[16]] = just_ticks
do.call("grid.arrange", c(subj_a_plots, ncol=1, top = subj))


subj_all_m_func = function(subj){
  subj_a_plots = lapply(metrics, function(metric) plot_subj_m(subj, metric))
  marrangeGrob(grobs = subj_a_plots, ncol=1,nrow=length(metrics), top = subj)
}

all_subj_all_m_plots = lapply(subjs, subj_all_m_func)
```

```{r covid analysis}
covid_acc_time = data.frame(All = acc_time_all, `Pre-Covid` = acc_time_31020, Covid = acc_time_covid)
covid_acc_time_long <- gather(covid_acc_time, dataset, acc_time, All:Covid, factor_key=TRUE)

x_tick_label = c("All","Pre-Covid","Covid")
x_tick_labels = paste0(x_tick_label," (",c(sum(subj_days_all$days),sum(subj_days_31020$days),sum(subj_days_covid$days))," days)")
ggplot(covid_acc_time_long, aes(x= dataset, y = acc_time)) + 
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2) + 
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Individual GPS Footprint \n Identification Accuracy") +
  scale_x_discrete(labels=x_tick_labels) +

    geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity") +

ggplot(covid_gps_df_long, aes(x=feature, y=value)) +
```

```{r plot similarity matrix no ranking}
gps_wide_matrix = data.frame()

      }

}
```

```{r all different features combined}
df_diff_time = data.frame(cov = acc_time, mean = acc_time_mean_cor, rmssd = acc_time_rmssd_cor, cb = acc_time_cb)
df_diff_time_long = gather(df_diff_time, feature, accuracy, cov:cb, factor_key=TRUE)
mu = ddply(df_diff_time_long, "feature", summarise, grp.mean=mean(accuracy))
p_diff_feature = ggplot(df_diff_time_long, aes(x=accuracy,color = feature, fill = feature)) + 
    geom_density(size = 1, alpha = 0) + 
    #geom_histogram(aes(y=..density..), alpha=0.2, 
    #            position="identity") + 
    geom_vline(data=mu, aes(xintercept=grp.mean, color=feature),
             linetype="dashed") +
    labs(y = "Density", x = "GPS Footprint Prediction Accuracy") + 
    theme_cowplot() +
    theme(legend.position="top")

pdf(file.path(paste0(output_path,"diff_features_density",sen,".pdf")),height = 4,width = 10)
p_diff_feature
dev.off()   

```

```{r ALS}
ids = read.xlsx(file.path(project_path,"data/clinical_data/subjecttracker_4.xlsx"))[1:length(unique(gps_df_clean2$IID)),]

psych_sum = psych_beiwe_acc_subj %>%
            mutate(sum_als = rowSums(.[263:280], na.rm = T)) %>%
            mutate(sum_ari = rowSums(.[grep("^ari_[0-9]$",colnames(psych_beiwe_acc_subj))], na.rm = T))

psych_sum = inner_join(psych_sum, subj_days, by = c("beiweID" = "IID"))

psych_als = data.frame(als = psych_sum[,263:280], BBLID = psych_sum$BBLID)
psych_ari = data.frame(ari = psych_sum[,23:29], BBLID = psych_sum$BBLID)
als_ari_sum = lm(acc ~ days+ sum_als + sum_ari , data = psych_sum)

days_plot = visreg(als_ari_sum, "days", gg = T, line=list(col="black")) + 
            ylab("GPS Footprint \n Prediction Accuracy") + xlab("Days Collected") +

            ylab("GPS Footprint \n Prediction Accuracy") + xlab("Affective Lability Score (ALS)") +
            theme_cowplot() + stat_cor(method = "pearson")
sum_ari_plot = visreg(als_ari_sum, "sum_ari", gg = T, line=list(col="black")) + 
            ylab("GPS Footprint \n Prediction Accuracy") + xlab("Affective Reactivity Index (ARI)") +
            theme_cowplot() + stat_cor(method = "pearson")
mod <- lm(acc~sum_als*sum_ari + days , data=psych_sum)
```

```{r subj gps/acc scatter}
pairs(df_accgps_subj[,1:3], pch = 19,  cex = 0.5,
      lower.panel=NULL)



upper.panel<-function(x, y){
  points(x,y, pch=19)
  r <- round(cor(x, y), digits=2)
  txt <- paste0("R = ", r,",")
  usr <- par("usr"); on.exit(par(usr))
  par(usr = c(0, 1, 0, 1))
  text(0.2, 0.9, txt)
  #abline(coef = c(0,1))
  

  # p-value calculation
  p <- cor.test(x, y)$p.value
  txt2 <- format(c(p, 0.123456789), digits = 2)[1]
  txt2 <- paste("p= ", txt2, sep = "")
  if(p<0.01) txt2 <- paste("p= ", "<0.01", sep = "")
  if(p<0.001) txt2 <- paste("p= ", "<0.001", sep = "")
  if(p<0.0001) txt2 <- paste("p= ", "<0.0001", sep = "")
  if(p<0.00001) txt2 <- paste("p= ", "<0.00001", sep = "")
  if(p<0.000001) txt2 <- paste("p= ", "<0.000001", sep = "")
  text(0.6, 0.9, txt2)
  
}



pdf(file.path(paste0(output_path,"accgps_subj_pair.pdf")),height = 6,width = 6)
pairs(df_accgps_subj[,c(3,1,2)], lower.panel = NULL, 
      upper.panel = upper.panel)
dev.off()
```

```{r age and sex}
age_sex_accgps_fit = lm(accgps ~ age + sex + acc_days + gps_days, data = acc_subj_dx_sum)

age_sex_accgps_fit = update(age_sex_accgps_fit,~.-age)
age_sex_gps_fit = update(age_sex_gps_fit,~.-age)
age_sex_acc_fit = update(age_sex_acc_fit,~.-age)


anno_text = paste("R=",round(cor.test(update(age_sex_acc_fit,~.-age)$residuals,age_sex_acc_fit$model$age)$estimate,2), ", p=", round(summary(age_sex_acc_fit)[[4]][,4]["age"],3))

anno_text = paste("R=",round(sqrt(summary(lm(update(age_sex_acc_fit,~.-sex)$residuals ~ age_sex_acc_fit$model$sex))$r.squared),2), ", p=", round(summary(age_sex_acc_fit)[[4]][,4]["sex2"],5))

p = visreg(age_sex_acc_fit, "sex", gg = T, line=list(col="#3576b5",size = 0.5, alpha = 1), 
       points=list( size=2, pch=19), fill= list(fill=c("#b3d3f2"), alpha = 1)) + 
  xlab("Sex") + ylab("Individual Footprint Distinctiveness") + 
  theme_cowplot() + 
  annotate("text", -Inf, Inf, label = anno_text, hjust = -0.1, vjust = 1)
  

pdf(file.path(paste0(output_path,"sex_acc_scatter_noage.pdf")),height = 4,width = 5)
print(p)
dev.off()

p = visreg(lm(accgps ~ age + sex + acc_days + gps_days, acc_subj_dx_sum), "sex", gg = T, line=list(col="#3576b5",size = 0.5), 
       points=list( size=2, pch=19), fill= list(fill=c("#b3d3f2"))) + 
  xlab("Sex") + ylab("Individual Footprint Distinctiveness") + 
  theme_cowplot()

pdf(file.path(paste0(output_path,"Dx_ema.pdf")),height = 4,width = 5)
print(p)
dev.off()
```
